channel.title: Events on Penn CS Theory Group
channel.description: Recent content in Events on Penn CS Theory Group

item.title: Theory Seminar Fall 2025: 9/05 through 12/05
item.description: The theory seminar is back for Fall 2025! Talks will take place Fridays, 12-1pm in Amy Guttman Hall 414. The first schdueled talk is on September 5th, and the seminar is currently schdueled to run through December 5th. Hope to see you there!
